availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Frisby (Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer and physician.)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer and physician. Overton County, Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Frisby. Father of Lavina Frisby, John S. Frisby, Rebecca S. Frisby, and James T. Frisby. Student at Bethany College, Brooke County, Virginia, in 1842. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Overton County, Sixth District, p. 13B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 728.
Catalogue, and Certain Details of Bethany College (Bethany, VA: A. Campbell: 1842), 5.
